segments.text: Excuse me , sir , your steamed crabs is coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks delicious . Can you tell me how to enjoy it ? It's my first time to eat it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mix a little soya sauce , vinegar and sliced ginger on this plate and dip the meat in it before eating .
segments.speaker: S1
